attributes.action: Change the seven day week to four days work with a three day weekend.
attributes.additional_details: There are numerous other countries where it has been proven that with this kind of system people are more productive... as well as most importantly much happier!
attributes.background:
I am becoming more and more frustrated with my weekends going too quickly... and I'm sure you are too. So let's change this tired old system and give ourselves an extra days rest. 

So, if you too are sick of that dreaded Monday morning coming round too quickly, you know what you need to do.
